Introduction

Ricky is a Hong Kongese trainee under One Cool Jacso Entertainment. He is a member of the upcoming boy group PICKUS. He was a pre-debut member of the boy group OCJ NEWBIES. He is best known for being a contestant on the survival shows World Klass and Fan Pick.
